column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2

#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent

#Summary1=(human1) In a letter from Ash Wednesday -- Thursday 1969, Marcie Rickenbacker write to her Mom from Abbot Academy about her grades (B, B- and C in math), her English project, her French comp., guys she is asking out to the Prom and Winter Carnival, as well as the Catholic Mass she went to with Sue and 2 other girls to get her ashes before school.
#Summary2=(human2) Marcie Rickenbacker writes a letter to her mother about her school projects and tests, as well as prom, and a Catholic Mass attended for Ash Wednesday.

#Summary3=(claude-3-5-sonnet-20241022) On February 1969, Marcie writes to her mother detailing her academic progress at Abbot Academy, including her relief at avoiding academic probation, grading frustrations in Math and French, her potential Prom dates, Winter Carnival plans, and her Ash Wednesday church experiences.

#Summary4=(gpt4o) On Ash Wednesday 1969, Marcie writes to her mother, updating her on her academic progress, expressing frustration over a poor math test grade, mentioning social plans including asking a friend to the Prom, describing attending an early Catholic mass and receiving ashes, and sharing her decision to give up extra and fattening foods for Lent.

#Summary5=(Meta-Llama-3-8B-Instruct) Marcie writes to her mom about her hectic school life, including a busy project, test grades, and social events, with mentions of her Catholic and Episcopalian faith practices during Lent.
#Text=P.S. Slacks are on the way , sent yesterday .
#Text=Miss Marcie Rickenbacker
#Text=Abbot Academy
#Text=Andover , Massachusetts 01810
#Text=Ash Wednesday 1969
#Text=Thurs.
#Text=Dear Mom ,
#Text=Sorry for the delay of this letter .
#Text=I just started my Eng. project on Sunday and have been working like mad to get some or all of it done .
#Text=Academic probabition list came out yesterday , I 'm not on it .
#Text=Yeah !
#Text=So far in Math I 've gotten a B & B- and we had a take home test Tues. nite .
#Text=After working so hard and long on it , I hope to get a good mark .
#Text=I did a French comp. the other nite .
#Text=Arosa said it was terrible , I just ca n’t write comps. , so I ’ve got a confer. this after .
#Text=Oh crum , I just got back my Math test and got a C .
#Text=I 'm so mad , after working so hard , I could scream !
#Text=I asked the guy , who really helped me at the Hum. Relations Confer , to the Prom .
#Text=I really am Crazy , I do n't think Mike will come , but I hope so .
#Text=If he does n't then I 'll probably ask Dan Kent or Craig Ashley .
#Text=I 'm supposed to go to the Winter Carnival this Sat. with Ed Davison , but have n't seen or heard from him since Sunday when he walked me back from Vespers .
#Text=I said , " Hey , write sometime " & he said , “ Yeah , sometime . " .
#Text=On the way back Sue Cleveland & I noticed cars at the Epis. church so we decided to have commonion .
#Text=We got back to school at 7:40 and did n't have breakfast .
#Text=I 've given up all extras & fattening foods for lent .
#Text=Oh , I 'm starving !
#Text=Please write soon .
#Text=Love & xxx , to all ,
#Text=Marcie
